message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about geological processes and the formation of the Grand Canyon. Over time, the Grand Canyon has eroded and deepened, so the correct answer is option (D) - it was less deep. Option (A) is incorrect because the Grand Canyon has not become wider over time. Option (B) is also incorrect because the Grand Canyon has become deeper. Option (C) is subjective and not related to the actual changes in the canyon.

This question requires some basic knowledge about the geological history of the Grand Canyon. Over millions of years, the Colorado River has carved out the Grand Canyon, making it deeper. Therefore, in the past, the Grand Canyon would have been less deep than it is today. Option (A) is incorrect because the Grand Canyon has not become wider over time. Option (C) is subjective and not related to the physical characteristics of the canyon.

Option (A) is incorrect because the width of the canyon may have changed, but the question specifically asks about depth.
